CustomField.description: If checked, the amount updated in Sales Tax Amount field shall be updated as Tax amount for this line. Ensure Allow Tax Override in AvaTax for Salesforce configuration is also checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the amount updated in Sales Tax Amount field shall be updated as Tax amount for this line. Ensure Allow Tax Override in AvaTax for Salesforce configuration is also checked.
CustomField.label: Tax Override
